clef.gui.moreSongs: You can get more songs online in abc format
config.clef.prop.favoriteBand.name: Favorite Band
config.clef.prop.showFileTitle.name: Show File Title
config.clef.prop.instrumentVolume.name: Instrument Volume
config.clef.prop.zombieSpawnRate.name: Zombie Instrument Spawn Chance
config.clef.prop.mobDropRate.name: Mob Drop Rate
config.clef.prop.lootSpawnRate.name: Instrument Loot Spawn Weight
config.clef.prop.disabledLootChests.name: Disabled Loot Chests
config.clef.prop.showRecordPlayingMessag: Show Record Playing Message For Song
config.clef.prop.maxClientTickTime.name: Max Client Tick Time
config.clef.prop.creatableInstruments.co:
Can players create their own instruments with a name tag and 9 other instruments?
0 = No
1 = Only instruments the server doesn't have
2 = Only instruments the server has
3 = Any instrument
config.clef.prop.favoriteBand.comment: Do you have a favourite band? Setting this will always set your band when you start playing a song.
config.clef.prop.showFileTitle.comment: Some abc file have titles but aren't set properly. This will make the list show file names instead.
config.clef.prop.allowOneHandedTwoHanded: Allow players to use instruments that normally require two hands, with one hand?
config.clef.prop.disabledInstruments.com: Disabled instruments by their item name.
config.clef.prop.instrumentVolume.commen: Volume of the instruments, divided by 100.
config.clef.prop.zombieSpawnRate.comment: Chance of the zombies to spawn with an instrument, divided by 10000. 0 to disable
config.clef.prop.mobDropRate.comment: Chance for mobs to drop an instrument, divided by 10000. 0 to disable. Affected by looting level.
config.clef.prop.onlyHostileMobSpawn.com: Only allow hostile mobs to drop instruments when they die.
config.clef.prop.lootSpawnRate.comment: Weightage for the spawn chance of instruments in loot chests. Set to 0 to disable.
config.clef.prop.disabledLootChests.comm: Loot tables for chests that will be disabled. EG: minecraft:chests/stronghold_corridor
config.clef.prop.showRecordPlayingMessag: Should we show a message of "Now Playing" for songs, similarly to records.
config.clef.prop.maxClientTickTime.comme:
The time clef will wait when the game is frozen until it tries to restart the sound system to resolve a possible hang
This is an additional detection, clef has second method of detecting sound system freezes, but it does not work every time
Set zero to disable
